spaceSurvivor
Class SpaceSurvivor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      spaceSurvivor.SpaceSurvivor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class SpaceSurvivor
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable

SpaceSurvivor is the main (GUI) class for this game. Some methods and additional source code are from Dr. Slattery: http://www.mscs.mu.edu/~mikes/cosc3550/demos/ForestFire-FullScreen/ForestFire.java

Author:
Paul
See Also:
Serialized Form

Parameters:

height -
bitDepth -

setBufferStrategy

private void setBufferStrategy()
Switch on page flipping: NUM_BUFFERS == 2 so there will be a 'primary surface' and one 'back buffer'.

finishOff

private void finishOff()
Tasks to do before terminating. Called at end of run() and via the shutdown hook in readyForTermination(). The call at the end of run() is not really necessary, but included for safety. The flag stops the code being called twice.

restoreScreen

private void restoreScreen()
Switch off full screen mode. This also resets the display mode if it has been changed.

screenUpdate

private void screenUpdate()
use active rendering

gameRender

public void gameRender(java.awt.Graphics g)
Parameters:

Main animation loop of this game.

detectScreenSize

private static void detectScreenSize()
Detect user's screen size and set game for this size.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Gets this game started by instantiating a SpaceSurvivor object. Game screen size automatically detected from user's current screen resolution. Otherwise, run this application with two parameters: screen width, screen height

Parameters:
args - [0]-screen width [1]-screen height
